title: Remove cart functionality

requirements.text: Remove the CartContext provider and all cart state management logic from frontend/src/contexts/CartContext.tsx
acceptanceCriteria: CartContext.tsx file is deleted
No cart state management code remains in the codebase

requirements.text: Remove the Cart component from frontend/src/components/Cart.tsx that displays cart items, quantity controls, and checkout button
acceptanceCriteria: Cart.tsx component file is deleted
No cart display UI remains in the application

requirements.text: Remove the CartButton component from frontend/src/components/CartButton.tsx that shows cart item count and opens cart sheet
acceptanceCriteria: CartButton.tsx component file is deleted
No cart button appears in the header or anywhere else

requirements.text: Remove CartButton from the Header component in frontend/src/components/Header.tsx
acceptanceCriteria: CartButton import is removed from Header.tsx
CartButton is not rendered in the Header component
Header renders without cart functionality

requirements.text: Remove all 'Add to Cart' buttons and cart-related functionality from the ProductCard component in frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx
acceptanceCriteria: No 'Add to Cart' buttons appear on product cards
Cart context imports are removed from ProductCard
ProductCard only shows product information and external platform link

requirements.text: Update the Checkout page in frontend/src/pages/Checkout.tsx to remove dependencies on cart state and cart-related UI
acceptanceCriteria: Checkout page does not import or use CartContext
Cart items display is removed from checkout UI
Checkout page handles product purchase without cart dependency

requirements.text: Update PaymentSuccess page in frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccess.tsx to remove cart clearing logic and cart dependencies
acceptanceCriteria: CartContext imports are removed
No cart clearing operations remain
Payment success flow works without cart

requirements.text: Remove the Payment component from frontend/src/components/Payment.tsx that creates Stripe checkout sessions using cart items
acceptanceCriteria: Payment.tsx component file is deleted
No cart-based payment initiation code remains

constraints: Do not modify backend/main.mo order management or Stripe integration logic
Preserve existing product catalog and search functionality
Keep authentication and admin functionality intact
nonGoals: Modifying product display or search features
